meanings.definition: The process of creating an X-ray image of veins using contrast material.
meanings.sent1: During the phlebography, the doctor injected dye into my arm to see my veins on the X-ray.
meanings.sent2: The phlebography showed a clear picture of the veins in my leg.
meanings.sent3: The phlebography revealed my veins dancing on the X-ray screen.
meanings.sent4: Her veins lit up like a neon sign in the phlebography image.
meanings.sent5: I will never forget the intricate patterns of my veins captured in the phlebography.

meanings.definition: A diagnostic procedure that involves injecting a contrast material into a vein to visualize blood flow.
meanings.sent1: After the phlebography, the doctor explained the blood flow in my veins.
meanings.sent2: The phlebography helped identify any blockages in the veins.
meanings.sent3: During the phlebography, my veins played hide and seek with the contrast material.
meanings.sent4: The phlebography painted a vivid picture of blood flowing through the veins.
meanings.sent5: The phlebography made the invisible visible, showing the blood's journey through my veins.
